Created an attachment (id=17099)
Log of error

I've attached the log file.  Note that the problem doesn't occur under 3.1M3.

Separately.  Couldn't see how to add comment to existing bug (no link on page).
 Can anybody advise me?
Take back adding comment advice request. Yes, it was under my nose...

Thanks for that Konrad.

Is there any obvious reason why the call would work under M3 and not under M4?

Ian - next nightly build v>20050112 will contain a fix that avoids the NPE. 
Please let us know if that fixes it for you.

Konrad: can you reproduce the problem too? Or is Ian's machine the only one 
that reproduces the problem? The NPE probably originates from new code since 
M3 that accesses IE's property "RegisterAsDropTarget". For some reason, on 
Ian's machine it cannot get it.
It works fine for me, and probably great majority of machines.

Thanks Christoph.

In the nightly build (eclipse-SDK-N20050114-0010-win32.zip) Help does open
correctly.

For your interest, the problem occured under both my Windows XP SP2 PC (at
home), and under Windows 2000 SP4 (at work).

Cheers again,
Ian.

Closing PR for now. We were not able to reproduce the failure to obtain the 
RegisterAsDropTarget value reported here. We handle that failure case but 
don't understand under what circumstances it can fail.
*** Bug 83588 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
